column1: tossed up, carefully on frontfoot and driven down to long-on for a run
tossed up, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
flighted on leg, moves back and drags it away to square leg for a boundary
tossed on off, drives it nicely to mid-off
tossed up, giving him room to free his arms, drives it firmly past the cover fielder for a boundary
tossed on off, onto the frontfoot with a long stride and defends it
loosener outside off, on the frontfoot drives it past cover and cover point for a boundary, great start for ireland here
good length outside off, looks to drives it towards point but misses it, kept a bit low
fuller outside off, pushed to cover point nicely of the frontfoot
good length angling away from the left hander, looks to push it towards cover but gets beaten
good length outside off, rocks on the backfoot and pushes it to cover point
good length on middle, nicely onto the frontfoto and plays it back to the bowler, end of the over, good comeback after being hit for a boundary on the first ball
flighted on middle-leg, nudges it to on-side for a quick run
flights it outside off, porterfield carefully lets it spin and pushes it towards covers for a quick run
tossed on off, onto the frontfoot and blocks it
tossed on off, pushing the stirling onto the backfoot for a defense
tossed up, onto the backfoot and manages to get bat on it as it keeps a bit low and spins away from him
flighted on middle, onto the backfoot nicely and nudges it towards square leg for a run
drifitng on the pads, tries to nudge it but gets it of his pads and runs past the keeper for a boundary
good length on middle-leg, onto the backfoot and manages it nicely to on-side as it gets high on him for a couple
fuller onto the pads, flicks it away to square leg for a couple, didn't time it that well to reach the boundary
back of a good lenght, pulls it from outside off to mid-wicket for a boundary
good length on middle, onto the frontfoot and pushes it defensively back to the bowler
full outside off, drives it on the rise between cover and cover point for a run, good stop by the fielder to limit it to a run only
tossed on middle, lets it spin and pushes it back to the bowler
flighted on middle, lets it spins and pushes it to square leg for a run
quicker on middle, onto the frontfoot to defend but gets beaten and it went on straight after pitching, hits him on the pads loud appeal but not-out
flighted outside off, onto the backfoot and cuts it uppishly but away from short thirdman for a couple as he chases it down
tossed on off, onto the frontfoot and pushed to cover
tossed on middle-leg, onto the frontfoot to nudge it to on-side but gets hit on the pads again, loud appeal but not-out, porterfield once again suffering infront of the mysteries of mujeeb
good length outside off, drives it to cover fielder
good length on middle, onto the frontfoot nicely and does a defense
good length on off, onto the frontfoot and drives it on the rise between cover and cover point for a couple as they chase it down
good length on off, drives it nicely but to the cover point fielder
good length outside off, drives it firmly to the right of cover and he puts in a dive to stop it, superb effort
full on off, pushes it gently to cover fielder

onto the frontfoot and does a defense
